ComicInfo.Series: The Second Life of Doctor Mirage
ComicInfo.Title: Unfinished Business - Part 1
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:30:10. [Issue ID 153537]
ComicInfo.Tags: Steve Baker,Carmen Ruiz,Baker children,Chris Taylor,Professor Mabry,Rico,Diane Baker,Doctor Mirage
ComicInfo.Summary: As part of a scientific study, Carmen and Hwen visit a haunted manor in Rhode Island, purportedly inhabited by the ghost of a Union soldier. Mysterious occurrences lead to disappearances, doppelgangers and a deadly diagnosis: There are bodies in the walls...
